pages.text: These tiered miners will dig a hole under it down to bedrock with the top layer remaining intact for safety. Each successive tier increases the range and applies a multiplier that stacks with the $(l:processenhancement:concepts/overdrive)Overdrive$(/l) effect.$(br)$(li)Basic: 3x3 area 1x multiplier$(li)Intermediate: 9x9 area 2x multiplier$(li)Advanced: 19x19 area 4x multiplier$(li)Industrial: 31x31 area 8x multiplier
